銸銸銸

銸字的基本解释

銸
zhé
铁钳、火夹之类。

銸
niè
古同“镊”。

銸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhé］
［《集韻》陟涉切，入葉，知。］
钻。铁钳、火夹等銸取之器。
[②]［niè］
［《集韻》諾叶切，入帖，泥。］
(1)拔毛发。后作“鑷”。
(2)同“鑈”。正。

銸字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　銸； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1306第10
【唐韻】陟葉切【集韻】陟涉切，?音輒。【說文】鉆也。　又【類篇】昵輒切，音聶。【玉篇】拔髮也。【類篇】箝也。與鑷同。　又【集韻】諾叶切，音捻。【博雅】正也。與鉩同。亦作鑈。

銸字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
銸字的起名意思

暂无。

Lu
Basic explanation of words
Lu
zhé
Iron tongs, fire clamps and the like.
Lu
niè
Gu Tong "tweezers."
Lu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhé］
["Jiyun" Zhishe cuts, enters the leaves, knows. ]
Drill. Iron tongs, fire clamps, etc.
[②]［niè］
["Ji Yun" Noye cut, insert post, mud. ]
(1) Plucking hair. Later called "tweezers".
(2) Same as "鑈". positive.
Lu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　銸; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 1306 No. 10
[Tang Yun] Zhi Yeqi [Ji Yun] Zhi Sheqi,? Sound. [Said the text] Drill also.　[Classes] Niche, Yin Nie. [Jade articles] Pull out hair too. 【Classes】Pliers also. Same with tweezers.　[Jiyun] Noye cut, sound twisted. [Bo Ya] Zheng Ye. Same as Xie. Also used as 鑈.
Lu
